text: Direct speech থেকে indirect speech-এ রূপান্তর করার সময় সাধারণত বাক্যের ক্রম পরিবর্তন হয়।
exampleAnswer: She said that she was happy.

text: Reporting verb যেমন said, told, asked ইত্যাদি ব্যবহার হয় indirect speech-এ।
exampleAnswer: He said that he would come tomorrow.

text: Pronoun এবং সময়ের শব্দ indirect speech-এ পরিবর্তিত হতে পারে। যেমন, I → he/she, today → that day।
exampleAnswer: She said that she was busy that day.

text: Present tense থেকে past tense-এ পরিবর্তন হয় indirect speech-এ।
exampleAnswer: He says that he lives here.

text: Question বাক্য indirect speech-এ পরিবর্তিত হলে, সাধারণত if বা whether ব্যবহৃত হয়।
exampleAnswer: He asked if you were coming.

text: Imperative sentence indirect speech-এ পরিবর্তনের সময় ‘to’ infinitive ব্যবহার হয়।
exampleAnswer: He told me to sit down.

text: If clause direct speech-এ থাকলে indirect speech-এ তা সাধারণত অপরিবর্তিত থাকে।
example: She said, "If it rains, I will stay home."
exampleAnswer: She said that if it rained, she would stay home.
